title: Game 4 Preview: Colorado Looks to Regroup Against Tampa Bay
description: Only five teams have overcome a 2-1 series deficit in the Stanley Cup finals, and Tampa Bay is trying to become the first to erase that lead in two seven-game series in a row.
dc:creator: Ben Shpigel
media:description: Nick Paul returned from a leg injury in Game 3 to score what proved to be the winning goal Monday in Tampa Bayâ€™s 6-2 win over the Colorado Avalanche.
